title: Long Covid Basics
content:
Prevention
CDC emphasizes
core strategies
to lower health risks from COVID-19, including severe outcomes such as hospitalization and death. Preventing severe outcomes from COVID-19 illness helps prevent Long COVID. Steps you can take to protect yourself and others include:
Staying up to date on COVID-19 vaccination
.
Practicing good
hygiene
(practices like handwashing that improve cleanliness)
Taking
steps for cleaner air
When you may have a respiratory virus:
Use
precautions to prevent spread
